Commander  0.0.1
The commander is a web-based application which allows users to interact with the flight software.

groundcontrol.consumers.Telemetry Class Reference

Deals with telemetry specific interactions between client and server. More...

Public Member Functions

def __init__ (self)
 Initializes globally required variables from redis cache and other data structures that are helpful in tracking messages when the instance of this class is called in a multiprocess setting (or with multiple workers).

 Accepts request and establishes a connection with client. More...

 Accepts disconnection message and disconnects with client. More...

 This is a hook to record inputs and subsequent outputs that are generated by Telemetry. More...

 Takes the telemetry message object and either sends a subscribe or unsubscribe signal to pyliner/yamcs. More...
 
def push (self, websocket_obj)
 A non-busy forever loop pushes telemetry to client. More...
